channel.title: संस्कृत-साङ्गणकाः Sanskrit Programmers
channel.description: Recent content on संस्कृत-साङ्गणकाः Sanskrit Programmers

item.title: Samskrit Bharti Courses Management System
item.description: (The below was contributed by the author of the software.) Background In Feb 2019, I did my first 10 days Samskrit Sambhashan Shibir. I came to know about this course through whats app. I loved doing the course. But I realized that it took more than 11 years to reach that message to me. Samskrit Bharti Courses have lots of potential but it was not reaching to many people in the country and outside.
